experiment.name: Transcription profiling by array of Arabidopsis overexpressing rice OsTOP6A1

description.text: 10-day-old wild-type and homozygous transgenic Arabidopsis seedlings (overexpressing rice topoisomerase 6 subunit A1; OsTOP6A1) grown under normal growth conditions were used for total RNA isolation. The 5 micrograms of each total RNA sample was processed for microarray analysis according to Affymetrix protocol.  Experiment Overall Design: The experiment involves the study of differential gene expression in transgenic Arabidopsis seedlings overexpressing rice topoisomerase 6 subunit A1 (OsTOP6A1) cDNA as compared to wild-type.Three biological replicates for each sample were used for microarray analysis.

bibliography.authors: Mukesh Jain, Akhilesh K Tyagi, Jitendra P Khurana
bibliography.title: Constitutive expression of a meiotic recombination protein gene homolog, OsTOP6A1, from rice confers abiotic stress tolerance in transgenic Arabidopsis plants.
